Title: Big Chicken Dinner
Plot: Marcus brings the islanders and the members of the Colorado together for a feast in the spirit of Thanksgiving; Grace searches for the truth when an essential crew member is accused of a crime.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Jay Karnes, Gideon Emery, Jessica Camacho, Michael Mosley, Michael Ng, Tyler Tuione, Jay Hernandez
